name: Larit
content:
Larit was a Human male who lived during the Galactic Civil War. He was present in Mos Eisley, on the planet Tatooine, after the Battle of Yavin.
Larit was a non-player character  in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Larit was added to the game with the release of the "Publish 25," a.k.a. the "New Game Enhancements," on November 15, 2005.
Larit was intended to be part of the cancelled Valarian Themepark. This questline was initially planned to be introduced in the game with the "Publish 23" to replace the original "Valarian Quest Series." Although the old "Valarian Quest Series" was deactivated with the release of Publish 23 on August 31, 2005, the new Themepark was never activated. NPCs of the Valarian Theme Park such as Larit were implemented into the game but they were not involved in any quest. Unused game files pertaining to this questline indicated that Larit was intended to be part of a new quest named "Parry." In this quest, Lady Valarian's henchman Larit tasked a spacer with making shirts for the Valarian gang.
